title: On/Offboarding, Optimization, & Customer Relations Specialist | Airbnb - STR Property Management | $6/hr
job_overview:
We are a fast-growing U.S.-based short-term rental (Airbnb) property management company operating in over 10 states. Our team is remote-first and performance-driven. We specialize in turning underperforming vacation rentals into high-earning listings through smart pricing, guest support, and streamlined operations.

This role focuses on onboarding and offboarding property owners, optimizing listings for performance, and supporting night-shift guest/client relations. If you’re organized, tech-savvy, and ready to handle both behind-the-scenes systems and guest-facing tasks, this is for you.


Key Responsibilities

Listing Optimization:
• Audit, update, and align property listings across all platforms (Airbnb, VRBO, etc.)
• Improve listing titles, descriptions, photo sequences, and amenities for better performance
• Maintain and update our internal listing database with accuracy
• Ensure internal teams are informed of listing changes or updates
• Create and improve SOPs related to listing structure, edits, and standards

Onboarding (New Properties):
• Guide new owners through onboarding calls and gather key property information
• Create listings based on client-provided details and supplemental research
• Communicate with internal departments to ensure smooth handoff to operations and guest support
• Ensure all internal documents and trackers are complete and accurate
• Improve onboarding workflows and documentation over time

Offboarding (Client Offboarding):
• Lead the process for delisting and transitioning off departing properties
• Secure and archive listing data before deletion
• Notify accounting/finance and operations of offboarding timelines
• Ensure all records and permissions are closed and properly removed
• Create and maintain SOPs related to offboarding and client exits

Customer Relations Support (as needed):
• Assist with guest/client messages and concerns during night hours
• Handle time-sensitive check-in/property issues or urgent guest requests
• Maintain high professionalism and service quality in overnight communications
• Support the day team by prepping notes, updates, or escalations from the night shift


Requirements

• Excellent written and spoken English
• Experience in Airbnb, STR operations, or property management is preferred
• Organized and detail-oriented with strong follow-through
• Confident using Hostaway, Slack, Airbnb, CRM tools, and Google Workspace
• Strong communication and client-facing experience for onboarding calls
• Willing to work night/overnight EST hours
• Capable of working independently during overnight hours with minimal supervision
• Fast learner with a systems mindset who’s confident improving processes
• Reliable internet connection


Salary & Growth
• $6/hr + bonus depending on performance

• Long-term position with opportunity to move into team lead roles
